feed.title: Henry Heffernan's Unbiased Political Feed
feed.subtitle: I am a totally unbiased and based CS student attending RPI. This is my political RSS Feed

entry.title: GOP Blocks Sanders Effort to Force Vote on Slashing Drug Prices
entry.summary: "How many people need to die, how many people need to get unnecessarily sicker, before Congress is prepared to take on the greed of the prescription drug industry?" asked Sen. Bernie Sanders.

entry.title: Trump Clogged the White House Toilet Trying to Flush Printer Paper
entry.summary: The former president’s crusade to increase the flushing power of the nation’s toilets takes on a whole new dimension.

entry.title: Oklahoma bill would fine teachers $10k for teaching anything that contradicts religion
entry.summary: Under Senator Rob Standridge’s Students’ Religious Belief Protection Act subjects like LGBT+ issues, evolution and the big bang theory, even birth control could be off the table

entry.title: McConnell breaks with RNC: Jan. 6 'violent insurrection'
entry.summary: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell criticized the Republican National Committee for its censure of Reps. Adam Kinzinger and Liz Cheney and broke with their language on the Jan. 6, 2021 riot, calling it a “violent insurrection.”

entry.title: Sen. Schumer plans to pass legislation that decriminalizes marijuana on a federal level
entry.summary: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer renewed his calls on Friday for the federal decriminalization of marijuana, gathering some of his congressional buds in lower Manhattan to make his case after working to roll up Republican support over the past several months.
